title: Massive lag/delay with normal ping and FPS?

embed.description: weird kind of lag I havent seen before

body:
For the past week the game has been unplayable at my house. Every single game.

Video is not mine, but looks exactly like what I'm experiencing. 

I usually get disconnected at loading screen. During the game I have periods of 1-2 minutes of huge delay, I have no control over anything and it looks like all champions are just aimlessly wandering the map. Then everything 'catches up' and I can play normally for a couple of seconds, until the cycle continues.

My ping and FPS during these games are completely fine. 

I played at my friends house this weekend and It worked great. No problems at all. So It's not my computer. My internet is working fine other than league. I have no idea what the problem is.

Would appreciate any help, thanks!

replies.body: This might be more the result of packet loss than fps issues.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) when you get a chance of the impacted games, and let me know what you find.  Keep in mind that regardless of how good your connection is, you can still have instability reaching specific servers.  We'll take a look and go from there!

Result I got from a bot game: 

"Your percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.92%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss."

Resetting my router and modem didn't work. Don't have anything running that would be the cause. I guess It's just a problem with my ISP? I only started having this problem after the last update. I wonder If It's actually correlated or not.

Thanks for sharing the results!  Resetting your router was a solid step, but there's a few more troubleshooting we can try.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out some more possibilities while tuning up the strength of your connection.  Let me know if that helps you out!

I am also experiencing packet loss. 

Been around for a couple patches and comes and goes.

Last game 527 packets lost total over 21 minute aram.
im having the same problem too and its really frustating.....since the patch. its not my internet
It's been since last patch for me too. But... as mentioned, the game works at my friends house perfectly fine. That's whats throwing me off.
